idea-plugin.name: Base16 Icy Dark
idea-plugin.vendor: icyphox (https://icyphox.ga), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Icy Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by icyphox (https://icyphox.ga). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
